name: Pool and Billiard Establishments
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants operating establishments that rent pool or billiard tables
for entertainment. Such merchants may offer coin-operated pool
tables, or may rent pool tables by the game or by the hour.
Shuffleboard, darts, and other games and refreshments may also be
available.
